Clarity_of_Instructions.description: Ability to provide clear, detailed instructions, ensuring employees fully understand required actions.

levels.1: Minimal instructions, leaving room for interpretation.
levels.2: Instructions are provided but may lack clarity in some areas.
levels.3: Instructions are clear enough to begin but could use more detail.
levels.4: Mostly clear instructions, offering general direction.
levels.5: Clear instructions covering essential points concisely.
levels.6: Detailed instructions providing enough guidance for most tasks.
levels.7: Clear and detailed instructions, instilling confidence.
levels.8: Highly clear instructions covering nearly all scenarios.
levels.9: Comprehensive instructions with ample clarity and depth.
levels.10: Exceptionally clear, ensuring full understanding and confidence.

Language_Adaptability.description: Adjusting language to the employee's understanding and context.

levels.1: Uses formal language without adapting to the employee's style.
levels.2: Mostly formal language, minor personal touches.
levels.3: Occasionally adapts language but not consistently.
levels.4: Balances formal language with some adaptability.
levels.5: Incorporates employee language style while maintaining professionalism.
levels.6: Adapts language to align well with employee preferences.
levels.8: Effectively mirrors employee style within company standards.
levels.9: Highly personalized language while respecting guidelines.
levels.10: Fully adapts language for a seamless, personalized communication style.

Verbal_Empathy.description: Conveying empathy and understanding in verbal interactions.

levels.2: Expresses limited empathy with some understanding.
levels.3: Shows empathy occasionally but not consistently.
levels.4: Empathy is present in most interactions.
levels.5: Empathy is clear, depending on context.
levels.7: Actively recognizes emotional cues, showing empathy.
levels.10: Consistently demonstrates empathy, creating supportive connections.

Conciseness.description: Ability to communicate clearly and concisely.

levels.3: Clear messages but could be more concise.
levels.10: Always succinct, clear, and to the point.

Tone.description: Adjusting tone according to context and audience.

levels.2: Formal tone with minor context adjustments.
levels.7: Adapts tone for professionalism and warmth.
levels.9: Warm and friendly while staying professional.
levels.10: Consistently warm, friendly, and tailored to each interaction.

Focus_on_Providing_Answers.description: Ability to provide direct, helpful answers efficiently.

levels.1: Primarily refers questions to a manager.
levels.2: Often refers to a manager but sometimes provides answers.
levels.3: Occasionally answers but often relies on referrals.
levels.4: Answers straightforward questions, referring complex ones.
levels.5: Balances direct answers and referrals as needed.
levels.6: Answers directly, referring manager when more context needed.
levels.8: Primarily provides answers, involving manager if necessary.
levels.10: All questions answered directly and clearly, ensuring understanding.

levels.5: Generally includes employee goals in interactions.
levels.8: Effectively supports motivation by referencing goals.
levels.9: Regularly uses goals to encourage growth.
levels.10: Consistently references goals, making interactions clear and motivational.

Assertiveness.description: Ability to assert company values and respect needs clearly.

levels.1: Rarely asserts company needs and values.
levels.10: Always assertive, ensuring clarity and respect for company values.

Persuasion_about_Company_Values.description: Ability to persuade employees to align with company values.

levels.1: Relies on employee initiative for alignment.
levels.2: Provides basic info, relying on employee interest.
levels.7: Frequently persuades employees of company values.
levels.10: Always emphasizes importance of company values in every interaction.

Diplomacy.description: Communicating with tact, ensuring respect and minimizing conflict.

levels.6: Often uses thoughtful language to avoid friction.
levels.8: Effectively manages tact to avoid misunderstandings.
levels.10: Fully diplomatic, fostering respect in all interactions.

Discipline.description: Maintaining and enforcing discipline within the workplace.

levels.3: Ensures discipline in straightforward scenarios only.
levels.10: Strong stance on discipline, guaranteeing adherence to standards.

Flexibility.description: Ability to adjust approach based on circumstances or employee needs.

levels.9: Very flexible, ensuring best fit for each scenario.
levels.10: Always adapts approach for optimal engagement and effectiveness.

Fairness.description: Ensuring fairness in interactions and decision-making.

levels.3: Aware of fairness, but not consistent.
levels.4: Often tries to be fair but can improve.
levels.6: Regularly applies fairness, treating all equitably.
levels.9: Highly attentive to fairness, ensuring equality.
levels.10: Guarantees fairness, respecting equality in every decision.

Adaptation_to_Employee_Personality.description: Adjusting communication style based on employee personality.

levels.5: Generally adapts approach to suit personality.
levels.10: Always customizes communication to each personality.

Evaluation_Precision.description: Providing accurate and detailed evaluations of employee performance.

levels.5: Generally clear evaluations covering key points.
levels.10: Comprehensive, ensuring accuracy and full detail.

Constructive_Feedback.description: Providing feedback that aids employee improvement.

levels.1: Minimal feedback, focusing on positives only.
levels.3: Some constructive feedback but limited depth.
levels.5: Regular constructive feedback on key areas.
levels.10: Fully balanced, actionable feedback for growth.

Conflict_Management.description: Managing conflicts to ensure fair and positive outcomes.

levels.10: Proactive, fair conflict resolution every time.

Immediate_Reframing.description: Reframing negative situations positively to maintain morale.

levels.6: Often reframes to keep morale intact.
levels.9: Highly effective in maintaining high morale.
levels.10: Always reframes challenges positively, ensuring strong morale.

Context_Consideration.description: Considering broader context (workload, personal situations) in decisions.

levels.9: Highly attentive to context for fair outcomes.
levels.10: Always balances decisions with full contextual awareness.

levels.4: Mostly respects confidentiality with minor gaps.
levels.9: Highly attentive to privacy, always secure.
levels.10: Absolute confidentiality, ensuring trust and security.

Adaptation_to_Change.description: Adjusting support and responses according to changes in policies, processes, or environment.

levels.1: Rarely adjusts, sticking to old methods.
levels.3: Some adaptation, but struggles with rapid changes.
levels.5: Generally adapts when changes are clear.
levels.9: Quickly and effectively adjusts to changes.
levels.10: Seamlessly adapts, ensuring continuity.

Flexibility_in_Approach.description: Modifying approaches based on specific situational needs.

levels.6: Regularly chooses suitable methods per case.
levels.9: Very adaptable to each unique situation.
levels.10: Always applies the most suitable approach.

Handling_Ambiguity.description: Remaining effective in situations with incomplete or unclear information.

levels.3: Works with ambiguity but lacks confidence.
levels.10: Excels in ambiguity, always guiding clearly.

Resilience_to_Setbacks.description: Recovering and maintaining support despite challenges.

levels.6: Regularly adapts strategies to overcome challenges.
levels.10: Fully adapts to setbacks, stable support always.

Responsiveness_to_New_Information.description: Quickly incorporating new information into recommendations.

levels.4: Moderate updates based on new info.
levels.5: Generally updates recommendations as info arrives.
levels.6: Regularly improves responses with new data.
levels.10: Instantly adapts, always current.

Analytical_Thinking.description: Critically analyzing information for informed decisions.

levels.3: Some analysis but may overlook complexities.
levels.5: Generally effective analysis for informed decisions.
levels.10: Fully analyzes all info ensuring well-informed decisions.

Weighing_Consequences.description: Considering potential outcomes of decisions before choosing.

levels.3: Weighs some consequences but may miss long-term effects.
levels.5: Generally balances positive and negative consequences.
levels.10: Always considers all outcomes, ensuring balanced decisions.

Time_Sensitivity.description: Making decisions in a timely manner considering urgency.

levels.3: Aware of urgency but may delay.
levels.7: Frequently timely decisions with good awareness.
levels.8: Consistently responds quickly to urgent tasks.
levels.10: Always swift and effective under time pressure.

Balancing_Short-Term_and_Long-Term_Goals.description: Balancing immediate needs with long-term objectives.

levels.3: Limited balance of short vs long term.
levels.5: Generally balances both present and future.
levels.6: Regularly ensures goals address both terms.
levels.7: Frequently considers impact on both timelines.
levels.8: Consistently aligns current actions with future vision.
levels.9: Highly skilled in balancing immediate and strategic goals.
levels.10: Fully integrates short- and long-term considerations.

Proactive_Decision-Making.description: Anticipating issues and making decisions before problems arise.

levels.2: Occasionally anticipates but rarely acts early.
levels.6: Regularly identifies and mitigates issues in advance.
levels.10: Always anticipates challenges, taking preemptive steps.

Skill_Recognition.description: Identifying and acknowledging employees' skills and strengths.

levels.9: Highly values individual strengths with meaningful praise.
levels.10: Fully identifies and acknowledges each unique skill.
Always encourages enthusiastically, motivating employees.

Career_Development_Guidance.description: Providing guidance on career growth opportunities.

levels.5: Generally aligns advice with company goals.
levels.9: Highly proactive in long-term growth support.
levels.10: Fully comprehensive career guidance for full potential.

Emotional_Support.description: Showing empathy and support for employees' emotional needs.

levels.10: Fully empathetic, creating a trusting atmosphere.

Motivation_Techniques.description: Applying effective motivation techniques for productivity.

levels.6: Regularly uses techniques to maintain engagement.
levels.10: Always applies powerful techniques for high motivation.

Adaptation_to_Learning_Styles.description: Adapting training methods to each employee's learning style.

levels.8: Consistently optimizes for each learning style.
levels.9: Highly responsive to individual learning needs.
levels.10: Fully customizes training for each employee's learning style.

Identifying_Strengths_and_Weaknesses.description: Recognizing employees' strengths and improvement areas.

levels.10: Fully identifies strengths/weaknesses for balanced development.

Providing_Resources.description: Offering or recommending resources for employee growth.

levels.6: Regularly supports skill development with resources.
levels.10: Always provides comprehensive, personalized resources.

Mentoring_Ability.description: Guiding employees through mentoring for growth.

levels.1: Minimal guidance, leaving mentoring to others.
levels.10: Fully mentors employees, providing comprehensive guidance.

Goal_Alignment.description: Aligning employee goals with company objectives.

levels.5: Generally aligns employee and company goals.
levels.9: Highly effective in integrating both sets of goals.
levels.10: Fully aligns employee goals with company objectives.

Inspiring_Trust.description: Building trust with employees for a reliable, supportive relationship.

levels.10: Fully inspires trust in every interaction.

Setting_Expectations.description: Clearly establishing employee expectations and goals.

levels.10: Always sets precise expectations for full clarity.

Role_Modeling.description: Serving as a positive role model, embodying expected values and behaviors.

levels.3: Some effort but needs stronger alignment.
levels.10: Fully embodies and promotes company values.

Delegation_Efficiency.description: Delegating tasks effectively to ensure proper assignments and efficiency.

levels.1: Minimal delegation, doing most work independently.
levels.10: Fully optimizes delegation for maximum team strength.

Leading_by_Example.description: Demonstrating commitment and high standards to lead by example.

levels.10: Fully embodies leadership by example.

Empowering_Employees.description: Giving employees confidence, support, and autonomy.

levels.10: Fully empowers employees with independence and confidence.

Recognition_and_Reward.description: Acknowledging and rewarding employees for their accomplishments.

levels.10: Fully acknowledges and rewards performance, boosting morale.

Supporting_Autonomy.description: Supporting employees' autonomy in their roles.

levels.7: Frequently encourages employees to take control.
levels.10: Fully supports autonomy, ensuring confident decision-making.

Building_Team_Cohesion.description: Fostering a strong sense of team cohesion and collaboration.

levels.10: Fully promotes team cohesion, ensuring strong teamwork.

Handling_Leadership_Challenges.description: Effectively handling leadership challenges like managing change or conflicts.

levels.9: Highly effective in overcoming leadership hurdles.
levels.10: Fully manages all challenges, ensuring cohesion and progress.

Goal_Setting.description: Helping employees set clear, achievable goals aligned with the company.

levels.9: Highly effective in impactful goal setting.
levels.10: Fully supports strategic, inspiring goal creation.

Performance_Tracking.description: Tracking and monitoring employee performance consistently.

levels.10: Fully monitors and supports continuous performance improvement.

Accountability.description: Encouraging accountability and responsibility in the team.

levels.10: Fully ensures accountability, enhancing trust and reliability.

Time_Management.description: Encouraging effective time management for meeting deadlines.

levels.10: Fully optimizes time management, ensuring efficiency.

Productivity_Analysis.description: Analyzing productivity levels to identify improvements.

levels.9: Highly effective in analyzing and guiding improvement.
levels.10: Fully comprehensive analysis, driving growth.

Providing_Timely_Feedback.description: Giving timely, relevant feedback for improvement.

levels.10: Always provides timely, constructive feedback.

Rewarding_Performance.description: Effectively rewarding accomplishments to motivate employees.

levels.10: Fully recognizes and rewards performance, ensuring motivation.

Addressing_Underperformance.description: Constructively addressing underperformance to guide improvement.

levels.9: Highly effective in guiding better performance.
levels.10: Fully addresses underperformance with actionable guidance.

Creating_Action_Plans.description: Developing clear action plans to reach goals and improve performance.

levels.9: Highly effective in creating targeted plans.
levels.10: Fully develops comprehensive action plans for growth.

levels.4: Moderate encouragement to focus on key tasks.
levels.6: Regularly supports focusing on important activities.
levels.8: Consistently ensures focus on high-impact tasks.
levels.9: Highly effective in guiding priority decisions.
levels.10: Fully promotes prioritization, ensuring maximum impact.

Inclusivity_Promotion.description: Promoting an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued.

levels.6: Regularly supports inclusivity and diverse perspectives.
levels.10: Fully promotes inclusivity, making everyone feel valued.
Fully embraces cultural diversity, fostering understanding.

Alignment_with_Company_Culture.description: Aligning interactions with company culture and values.

levels.10: Fully integrates and promotes company culture in all interactions.

Respect_for_Diversity.description: Respecting and embracing diversity in the workplace.

levels.5: Generally fosters respect for all backgrounds.
levels.10: Fully embraces diversity, creating a welcoming environment.

Supporting_Employee_Initiatives.description: Encouraging and supporting employee-led initiatives that align with company values.

levels.10: Fully encourages and supports employee initiatives for growth.

Conflict_Resolution.description: Effectively resolving conflicts to maintain harmony.

levels.10: Fully resolves conflicts with fairness and understanding.

Relationship_Building.description: Building and maintaining positive relationships with employees.

levels.9: Highly effective in creating strong relationships.
levels.10: Fully fosters trusting, positive relationships.

Mediation.description: Mediating effectively between team members for fair solutions.

levels.10: Fully ensures fair, collaborative outcomes.

Empathetic_Listening.description: Listening empathetically, understanding perspectives and feelings.

levels.9: Highly empathetic, ensuring employees feel heard.
levels.10: Fully engages in empathetic listening, fostering trust.

Trust_Building.description: Building and maintaining trust with employees.

levels.9: Highly effective in building strong trust.
levels.10: Fully fosters trust, ensuring supportive relationships.

Effective_Questioning.description: Asking effective questions to encourage open communication.

levels.3: Asks some questions but lacks insight.
levels.4: Moderate use of questioning for clarity.
levels.8: Consistently uses questions to promote openness.
levels.9: Highly effective in fostering engagement via questions.
levels.10: Fully utilizes questioning for deep understanding and open dialogue.

Openness_to_Feedback.description: Being open to and valuing feedback from employees.

levels.3: Listens but may not act on input.
levels.10: Fully values and acts on feedback, ensuring a supportive environment.

Handling_Employee_Concerns.description: Addressing employee concerns effectively and empathetically.

levels.10: Fully empathetic, always resolving concerns supportively.

Teamwork_Facilitation.description: Facilitating teamwork for cooperation and mutual support.

levels.10: Fully promotes teamwork, ensuring mutual support.

Creating_a_Positive_Work_Environment.description: Fostering a positive, supportive work atmosphere.

levels.2: Occasional promotion of a good environment.
levels.4: Moderate creation of a positive atmosphere.
levels.10: Fully ensures a positive, supportive work environment for all.
